author: admin
title: G&D Integrated Launches Redesigned Website
text:
G&D Integrated 
NAPERVILLE, Ill., Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- G&D Integrated has announced today the launch of a new, redesigned website, www.gdintegrated.com . The site reflects G&D's new brand positioning and their continued commitment to their customers to deliver Smart. Efficient. Logistics. The new site has been completely refreshed to support the new positioning and provide an optimum user experience. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150716/237592LOGO 
The site's refreshed and cleaner look, provides visitors and customers with improved navigation, enhanced content, and the latest news and events. Detailed product information will help customers fully understand G&D's complete range of logistics and transportation services and solutions. Case studies and white papers are available to detail the company's capabilities across a wide range of industries including heavy machinery, agriculture, commercial goods, and automotive. 
"Our industry is very complex and continues to evolve, but our expertise, solutions and the excellent service we provide through our dedicated employees continue to simplify that for our customers," said Mark London, vice president sales & marketing. "Providing a strong customer experience is at the core of our operating philosophy. We want our customers to be able to access the right information and data, to help simplify their business requirements." 
Enhancing the website is part of a larger growth strategy at G&D Integrated that includes a broader technology investment, market expansion and improved customer experience. This represents the first phase of enhancements, content and new functionality being introduced within the website. 
ABOUT G&D INTEGRATED G&D Integrated is a specialized provider of transportation and logistics services and has over 100 years of experience advancing innovative global supply chain solutions. Headquartered in Morton, IL, the company provides domestic transportation, contract logistics, and supply chain services to a variety of industries and employs 1,000 employees at over 20 facilities across North America. For more information, visit www.gdintegrated.com .
